articles.author: Reuters
articles.title: India launches inspection of Boeing 787s after Air India crash - CNN
articles.description: India’s government is urgently inspecting all Boeing 787s after a devastating Air India crash that claimed at least 270 lives this week, the aviation minister said on Saturday, adding that the authorities were investigating all possible causes.

articles.title: Thunder-Pacers: SGA, OKC rally to win Game 4 of NBA Finals - Al Jazeera
articles.description: Shai Gilgeous-Alexander’s strong fourth quarter carries Oklahoma City Thunder to crucial road win over Indiana Pacers.
articles.content: Shai Gilgeous-Alexander scored 15 of his 35 points in the fourth quarter as the Oklahoma City Thunder rallied for a gritty 111-104 victory over the Indiana Pacers that levelled the NBA Finals at two … [+3950 chars]
